roleset.name: slice, injure

example.name: cut-v: it slices, it dices, it makes julienne fries!
example.text: Trading companies can cut through the logjam that small - company owners often face .

propbank.arg: through the logjam that small - company owners often face

example.name: ARG3 and ARG1
example.text: God 's word cuts to the center of our joints and our bones .

propbank.arg: to the center of our joints and our bones

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1 and ARG4
example.text: Shippers cut about $ 35 billion from their annual , inter - city truck and rail costs , to about $ 150 billion , or about 6.4 % of gross national product , down from 8 % of GNP in 1981 .

propbank.arg: from their annual , inter - city truck and rail costs
to about $ 150 billion , or about 6.4 % of gross national product , down from 8 % of GNP in 1981

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Before the ban , the Vocational Assistance Commission for Retired Servicemen -LRB- VACRS -RRB- , which manages Chilan , had already cut down almost 6,000 hectares .

propbank.arg: the Vocational Assistance Commission for Retired Servicemen -LRB- VACRS -RRB- , which manages Chilan

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: He would scream and cut himself with rocks .

example.name: cut-v: inanimate meandering
example.text: The river cut through the plains .

example.name: cut-v: animate motion/path
example.text: Alternatively you can cut to the right through the trees .

example.name: cut-n: meandering
example.text: The escarpment edge is the river 's cut through the terrace .

example.name: cut-n: with instrument
example.text: one cut of the blade

example.name: cut-n: animate motion/path
example.text: the point guard should continue his cut through the lane and angle off along the baseline

example.name: cutting-n
example.text: We had a lot of fun reenacting their cutting of the cake

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Based on big corpus and comparison with 'reduce'. VN, FN, Exs updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, braid-41.2.2, build-26.1-1, cut-21.1-1, hurt-40.8.3-2, meander-47.7, split-23.2. (from former cut-v.01)
CUT-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, braid-41.2.2, build-26.1-1, cut-21.1-1, meander-47.7, split-23.2. (from former cut-n.01)
CUTTING-N NOTES: Roleset based on cut-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls Vncls amuse-31.1, braid-41.2.2, build-26.1-1, cut-21.1-1, hurt-40.8.3-2, meander-47.7, split-23.2. (from former cutting-n.01)

roleset.name: reduce

example.name: cut-v: with EXT
example.text: Magna recently cut its quarterly dividend in half .

example.name: cut-v: with start and end points
example.text: Goody Products Inc cut its quarterly dividend to five cents a share from 11.5 cents a share .

example.name: cut-v: but usually with just arg1
example.text: NL and Mr. Simmons cut the price they were proposing for Georgia Gulf .

propbank.arg: the price they were proposing for Georgia Gulf

example.name: cut-n
example.text: The cut in the dividend to 10 cents a share semiannually , from 20 cents

example.text: government funding cuts

example.name: cut-n
example.text: big pay cuts of $ 1.8 billion

example.name: cutting-n
example.text: This demonstrated the cutting in half of CO2 emitted compared to a regular flight .

CUT-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. No Vncls. (from former cut-n.02)

roleset.name: execute, make happen

example.name: cut-v: cut a deal
example.text: In addition , White House aides think that there are numerous other important measures Democrats badly wanted passed -- such as the scaling back of a controversial catastrophic health - care plan for the elderly -- that might provide the president leverage in cutting deals with Democrats .

example.name: cut-v: cut a truce
example.text: We are here to cut a truce : in fact the Moka is both : espresso and not espresso .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing in dealing with the old idiomatic roleset cut.03

roleset.name: make a recording (because records have to be etched)

example.name: cut-v
example.text: Thompson formed his first band , the Southern Melody Boys , while still in high school and they cut a record for the local VON label

example.name: cut-v
example.text: A little while ago we went into Transference Audio in Arlington to cut a new single with out pal Matthew Girard ( Parks , Golden Bloom ) .

propbank.arg: with out pal Matthew Girard ( Parks , Golden Bloom )

example.name: cut
example.text: How one band cut an album with a Whirlpool washing machine ( and more News of the Weird ) .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing in dealing with the old idiomatic roleset cut.03

roleset.name: ditch class

example.name: cut_class-m
example.text: It was full of violence and gangs and kids cutting class

example.name: cut-v
example.text: I CUT SOCIAL STUDIES EVERY DAY THIS WEEK .

example.name: cut_class-m
example.text: For those of you who did not just cut class from your Basic Physics Class , The kinetic energy placed into the Tedium element was converted and released as a photonic light energy .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing. If the word "class" is part of the more explicit name of the class (e.g. "physics class"), then it is not part of the rel for PB. Include it in the rel if it is listed alone, as in "cut_class".

roleset.name: move abruptly from one scene to another, as in film editing or viewing

example.name: cut-v
example.text: Cut to me doing the walk of shame to work from a hotel .

propbank.arg: to me doing the walk of shame to work from a hotel

example.name: cut-n
example.text: I do n't know if he got it " right " with the Director 's Cut of " Close Encounters . "

example.name: cut_off-v: detassling
example.text: The seed companies cut off the tassels of each plant .

roleset.name: cut back: reduce, reduction

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Nevertheless , there is no consideration being given to reducing the NT$ 5,000 - 6,000 spent each month on cleaning the tanks , let alone any thought of cutting back on the money spent on fish food or the occasional replacement fish .

propbank.arg: on the money spent on fish food or the occasional replacement fish

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: (from former cut-v.05)
CUTBACK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from cutback.05-n)

roleset.name: eliminate

example.name: cut_out-v
example.text: The move will cut out the cost of a middleman and give Specialized more control over marketing and sales .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: (from former cut-v.06)

roleset.name: arrange

example.name: cut_out-v: here ya go
example.text: As the building 's new owner , Chase will have its work cut out for it .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: (from former cut-v.09)

roleset.name: cut completely

example.name: cut_up-v: PETA would be happy
example.text: An undistinguished college student who dabbled in zoology until he concluded that he could n't stand cutting up frogs , Mr. Corry wanted to work for a big company `` that could do big things . ''

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: (from former cut-v.08)

roleset.name: laugh and joke

example.name: cut_up-v: intransitive
example.text: And we 're giggling and laughing and cutting up and having a really great time .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Not sure if args 1 and 2 will ever appear, their presence is based on"joke" frame. Frame created by Claire (from former cut-v.10)

roleset.name: reduce

example.name: cut_down-v: standard syntax
example.text: Take it from me who has experienced this first hand , my sister who is a nurse , my friend taking many meds whose dry mouth stopped the very day he cut down on his multivitamin and L.F who was incorrectly advised by , err , Donehue .

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to cut_back-v.05. . No VNcls. (from former cut-v.11)

roleset.name: get to the point

example.name: cut_to_chase-m
example.text: Let 's make this as painless as possible and cut to the chase that it 's all about getting and closing new business .

propbank.arg: that it 's all about getting and closing new business

example.name: cut_to_chase-m
example.text: Let me attempt to cut to the chase on this issue with what is my own humble opinion .

propbank.arg: with what is my own humble opinion

roleset.note: CUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing in dealing with the old idiomatic roleset cut.03

roleset.name: do a less than thorough job, take shortcuts

example.name: cut_corners-m
example.text: The seller tried to cut corners on quality to save a few cents per unit , which ended up costing them 6 figures and a product .

roleset.note: CUT_CORNERS-M NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing.

roleset.name: straightforward, candid

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is straightforward

example.name: cut_and_dry-m
example.text: She was very cut and dry about what she wanted , and very competitive !

roleset.name: measure up

example.name: cut_it-m
example.text: Do n't bother telling Nate he ca n't cut it in the NBA .

example.text: Many older athletes wonder if they can still cut it .

example.name: cut_mustard-m
example.text: They 'll see I ca n't cut the mustard in the business world .

example.name: cut_cheese-m
example.text: He cut the cheese , loudly .

example.name: cut_slack-m

roleset.name: to hurry off promptly, abandon effort, flee

mapping.source: (a2 / and :op1 (A / cut-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (B / bait)) :op2 (D / run-02 :arg0 n))
mapping.target: (A / abaondon-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (e / effort-01 :arg0 n :arg1 (n1 / NARG1)) :arg1-of (c / cause-01 :arg0 (n2 / NARG2)))

role.descr: danger; in the face of what

example.name: cut_and_run-m: arg0
example.text: Does America want us to lose this war and cut and run as Reid and Pelosi have impose upon our president ?

propbank.arg: as Reid and Pelosi have impose upon our president ?

example.name: cut_and_run-m: arg1
example.text: When the republican congress cut and run from its responsibility oversight , how did that war change ?

example.name: cut_bait_and_run-m:
example.text: Conversely , is it not in the best interest of a company to cut bait and run on a product that does n't look good ?

propbank.arg: on a product that does n't look good

roleset.note: CUT_AND_RUN-M: prepped by Tim/Julia during MWE framing

roleset.name: make a decision to act or give up

mapping.source: (o / or :op1 (A / fish-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :instrument (D)) :op2 (C / cut-01 :arg0 n :arg1 (D / bait)))
mapping.target: (A / decide-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (o / or :op1 (A / act-02 :arg0 n :arg1 (n1 / NARG1)) :op2 (C / give_up-07 :arg0 n :arg1 n1)))

example.name: fish_or_cut_bait-m
example.text: It 's time to fish or cut bait on tax reform , writes columnist and former U.S. Rep. Lee Hamilton .

roleset.note: FISH_OR_CUT_BAIT-M NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing.

roleset.name: superior to

example.name: cut_above-m
example.text: North Carolina might be a cut above the other teams because it has the experience of getting to the championship game last season where they lost on a game - winning three - pointer to Villanova .

propbank.arg: because it has the experience of getting to the championship game last season where they lost on a game - winning three - pointer to Villanova

roleset.note: CUT_ABOVE-M NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing.

roleset.name: do something self-detrimental to spite someone else

syntaxdesc.slots: B A F C D E

mapping.source: (A / cut-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (C / nose) :direction (B / off) :purpose (E / spite-01 :arg0 (n) :arg1 (F / face :part-of (n) :arg2 (n1 / NARG1))))

example.name: cut_off_nose_to_spite_face-m
example.text: An employer is not likely to cut off his nose to spite his face on the question of a closed shop .

propbank.rel: cut off nose to spite face
propbank.arg: on the question of a closed shop
